# Bakery Website Project

## Overview
Premium bakery website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, ready for Vercel deployment.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- TypeScript
- Responsive design with premium aesthetics

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js app directory with pages and components
- `/public` - Static assets
- Warm color scheme: brown, cream, gold accents

## Sections
- Hero/Landing - Eye-catching hero with call-to-action
- Featured Products - Showcase of bakery items with pricing
- About Us - Bakery story and values
- Menu/Products Gallery - Full product categories grid
- Contact - Location, hours, contact info

## Development

### Running Locally
```bash
npm run dev
```
Visit http://localhost:3000

### Building for Production
```bash
npm run build
npm start
```

## Deployment to Vercel

1. Push to GitHub
2. Import project in Vercel
3. Click Deploy

The site will be live at `your-project.vercel.app`

## Customization

- **Content**: Edit `app/page.tsx`
- **Colors**: Modify `tailwind.config.ts`
- **Fonts**: Update font families in tailwind config
- **Images**: Add to `/public` folder
